conbody.p: Before installing the Miramo DITA-OT plugin the following software must be installed and working on the target system:

ul.li: MiramoPDF or MiramoEnterprise vs 1.5 or above

conbody.p: MiramoPDF Personal and Desktop editions run on the following operating systems:
MiramoPDF Server and Miramo Enterprise editions are available to run on Windows Server operating systems - contact us for more information.
